titleStmt.title: An act enabling the commissioners of the militia to raise moneys for the present service of this Commonwealth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Tuesday the second of September, 1651. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
With engraving of Parliamentary seal at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
